name: Jack Lumber's Lineage
description:
You are Jack Lumber, you love lumbering bud sadly lack some important traits that hinder your exploration opportunities. Don't worry though, by choosing a good wife, your son might inherit the needed traits.

The goal is to find the place in the world that only super-people can access.

The game was developed in 48 hours at the 2018 Global Game Jam in Karlsruhe.
